duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and build individual and vendor line sales volumes.
Establish and maintain customer relationships, work effectively with team members, and establish new Saks Fifth Avenue accounts.
Focus on in-house training programs, pre-booked facial consultation events, and maintaining a properly merchandised counter while proficiently closing the retail sale.
Utilize Saks Fifth Avenue's clienteling system, drive their own business, and create their own success.

education_certification.credential: Min. 1 year retail experience, preferably in a customer-focused cosmetics environment.
Previously demonstrated successful sales experience, exceeding quota.
